archiefmat.titel: Generale staat van gouvernementsslaven in de Kolonie Curaçao
archiefmat.titel_eng: General list of the government slaves in the colony of Curaçao
archiefmat.scope: In seperate sections male and female slaves are listed by name. Also recorded are what seems to be the name of the mother of the slave. The slaves are counted according to what seem to be nine groups. (zie foto's)
archiefmat.notes: No dates specified; 19th century. The document is incomplete: the first page is missing.
